page.title: 06Blandford - A School Day.
page.content: My best day is Thursday.I wake up at 6.15 and read for an hour. Usually I have 3 slices of toast for breakfast. I get dressed at 8 o'clock & pack my bag for school. At 8.30 I ride to school in the car. I look for Carly but if I can't find her I look for Rachel & Tracy. We do silent reading first; I'm reading Romana the Pest. Next it's handwriting usually a poem, my best is'There was an Old Man with a Beard'.At 10.15 it's assembly.The Rector talks to us & today I played treble recorder in the band.After play I go for science. We learnt about magnets & now we're doing circuits. In lunchtime I go to Rainbow Club & then its games-Short Tennis is my favourite. At the end of the day its storytime with Mrs Davis. We've just finished 'Midnight Fox'.{ } {Rebecca Howell - aged 9 years.
